hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Friday Blue - Open Aquarium in Dubai Mall
hiveArticle.body:
Dubai Aquarium is one of the largest Aquariums in the World and itis located in Dubai Mall. If you do not want to go inside you can get a glimpse of it from the outside. 

![IMG-20160213-WA0050.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPGUrpeSrT7YKaqVyV52svzAzxCiwM6HJT4KTVgw58Ly7/IMG-20160213-WA0050.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0051.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmePM1yVJXbDrns2bwZuuMtYcs1dSGH2MHKgnfbTLAJ6mL/IMG-20160213-WA0051.jpg)
